CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Coal?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Coal is arc {Natural Gas}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Natural Gas?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Natural Gas is arc {Coal}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Hydropower to Oil in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Oil to Natural Gas in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Natural Gas and Oil in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Natural Gas and Oil is {165}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Oil and Hydropower in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Oil and Hydropower is {157}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Coal?
SC.A: The total flow output from Coal is {62}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Coal?
SC.A: The total flow input by Coal is {33}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 196? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {200} from {Wind} to {Hydropower}, a flow of {212} from {Hydropower} to {Wind}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 81? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {33} from {Wind} to {Coal}, a flow of {62} from {Coal} to {Wind}, a flow of {60} from {Hydropower} to {Natural Gas}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 81 and 161? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {108} from {Natural Gas} to {Oil}, a flow of {157} from {Oil} to {Hydropower}, a flow of {101} from {Natural Gas} to {Hydropower}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Oil to Natural Gas or from Hydropower to Natural Gas?
NC.A: The flow from {Oil} to {Natural Gas} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Hydropower to Wind, from Coal to Wind, or from Hydropower to Natural Gas?
NC.A: The flow from {Hydropower} to {Wind} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Coal}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Hydropower} and {Wind}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Natural Gas, Arc Oil, Arc Hydropower, Arc Wind, Arc Coal}.
